page.title: 13Cheshire Cheese.
page.content: Our area is famous for its dairy farms.The soil produces good,rich grass and this feeds a lot of cows which give the creamy milk which goes to produce the world famous {Cheshire {Cheese.}The rainfall is very even through out the year,with an average of 740mm so farmers can rely on getting a good crop of grass to feed their cows. Cheshire Cheese used to be made on the local farms, but not many of them make cheese these days and there aren't any cheese producing farms in our area. When Cheshire Cheese is made on a farm it is called {Farmhouse}and this is the best kind that you can get. To be{ {Farmhouse}it has to be made entirely on the farm. Nowadays, most farmers send their milk to factories to be turned into cheese.
